text: Samuel Emmanuel Essende Mbongu (born 30 January 1998) is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for US Avranches. ==Professional career== Essende joined the Paris Saint-Germain Academy at the age of 12, and spent his entire youth footballing career with them. On 10 August 2018, he signed his first professional contract with PSG, keeping him with the club until 1 June 2021.http://www.leparisien.fr/sports/football/psg/psg-premier-contrat-pro- pour-samuel-essende-10-08-2018-7849176.php On 22 August 2018, Essende signed on loan with K.A.S. Eupen in Belgium. He made his professional debut with Eupen in a 1-0 Belgian First Division A win over Royal Excel Mouscron on 25 August 2018. In August 2019, Essende signed for Championnat National side US Avranches. ==Personal life== Born in France, Essende is of Congolese descent. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Paris Saint Germain II |2015–16 |rowspan="2"|CFA |2||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0||2||0 |- |2016–17 |19||2||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0||19||2 |- |2017–18 |National 2 |14||3||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0||14||3 |- !colspan="2"|Total !35!!5!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0!!35!!5 |- |Eupen (loan) |2018–19 |First Division A |13||0||3||0||colspan="2"|—||3Appearances in the First Division A Europa League playoff||0||19||0 |- |US Avranches II |2019–20 |National 3 |1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0||1||0 |- |US Avranches |2019–20 |National |9||1||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||9||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !58!!6!!3!!0!!0!!0!!3!!0!!64!!6 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Montfermeil Category:French footballers Category:French people of Democratic Republic of the Congo descent Category:Championnat National players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Paris Saint-Germain F.C. players Category:K.A.S.
